    public class ToggleButton
extends Button
    The ToggleButton class, a special button with two states; on, and off.

        Instantiates a new toggle button.
        Parameters:
        container - The GameContainer context
        image - The image to display when the button is untoggled.

        x - The x coordinate.
        y - The y coordinate.
